item.description:
So it looks like we're due for an event. This is very last minute but if people are up for half off specials at the Boston location tomorrow meet me at the Back Bay Melting Pot. If the interest level is low I will cancel this event.  http://www.meltingpot.com/boston-back-bay/specials/happy-hour Happy Hour MONDAY - FRIDAY

Relax at the end of the day with a dip at The Melting Pot. Our cheese and chocolate fondues and non-fondue bar menu are 50% off in the bar area between 4 p.m. and 6 p.m.

This location offers a non-fondue bar menu to complement an extensive wine list (featuring approximately 200 selections of wine from around the world), beers and specialty cocktails. The menu features gourmet nibbles such as lobster quesadillas, savory sate skewers, seared ahi tuna, smoked salmon bruschetta, garlic Dijon shrimp, Kobe beef sliders and flatbreads
